questions.question: You have two ropes, and each takes exactly one hour to burn.  How would you user them to time exactly 15 minutes?
questions.answer:
```js
	1. Light Rope 1 at both ends and Rope 2 at one end.
	2. When the two flames on Rope 1 meet, 30 minutes will have passed. Rope 2 has 30 minutes left of burn time.
	3. At that point, light Rope 2 at the other end.
	4. In exacrtly 15 minutes, Rope 2 will be completely burnt.
```
